title: Mirkwood spider
data:
[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**Mirkwood spiders** are more powerful [spiders](/wiki/Spider "Spider") that appear in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack").

In addition to the common variety, there are also more dangerous mirkwood elders.

## Mirkwood spider

| s mirkwood spider *(No tile)*                                   |                                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")** | 12                                                                                               |
| **Attacks**                                                     | Bite 2d8 [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") (strength), Kick 1d1 [webbing](/wiki/Webbing "Webbing") |
|                                                                 |                                                                                                  |

| s mirkwood spider *(No tile)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | 12                                                                                               |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | Bite 2d8 [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison") (strength), Kick 1d1 [webbing](/wiki/Webbing "Webbing") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                  |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 8                                                                                                |
| **Base [experience](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | 131                                                                                              |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 15                                                                                               |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 0                                                                                                |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 0                                                                                                |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | −5 (chaotic)                                                                                     |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                  |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 1 (Very rare)                                                                                    |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Yes                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                  |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 1450                                                                                             |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | 400                                                                                              |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | large                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                  |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison")                                                                  |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison")                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                                  |
| A mirkwood spider:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* can [lay eggs](/wiki/Oviparous "Oviparous").
* is [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") to eat.
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* appears only in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").
* normally appears in large [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                                  |

The common mirkwood spiders are encountered on some quests; also, [giant spiders](/wiki/Giant_spider "Giant spider") will [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into them.

Mirkwood spiders spread [webbing](/wiki/Web "Web") with their attacks, potentially preventing you from retreating.

## Mirkwood elder

| s mirkwood elder *(No tile)*                                    |                                                                                                                                                      |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")** | 19                                                                                                                                                   |
| **Attacks**                                                     | Bite 4d8 [vampiric](/index.php?title=Vampiric\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Vampiric (page does not exist)"), Kick 1d1 [webbing](/wiki/Webbing "Webbing") |
|                                                                 |                                                                                                                                                      |

| s mirkwood elder *(No tile)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                                                                                      |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | 19                                                                                                                                                   |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Bite 4d8 [vampiric](/index.php?title=Vampiric\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Vampiric (page does not exist)"), Kick 1d1 [webbing](/wiki/Webbing "Webbing") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                      |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 16                                                                                                                                                   |
| **Base [experience](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 429                                                                                                                                                  |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 18                                                                                                                                                   |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 0                                                                                                                                                    |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 0                                                                                                                                                    |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | −5 (chaotic)                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                      |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 0 (Not randomly generated)                                                                                                                           |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | No                                                                                                                                                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                      |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 2900                                                                                                                                                 |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 800                                                                                                                                                  |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | huge                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                      |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison")                                                                                                                      |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison")                                                                                                                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                      |
| A mirkwood elder:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* can [lay eggs](/wiki/Oviparous "Oviparous").
* is [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") to eat.
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                                                                                      |

**Mirkwood elders** are ancient, blood-sucking spiders. Their vampiric bite attack drains a level on 1 out of every 3 successful attacks, regardless of [magic cancellation](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation").

Mirkwood elders also spread webbing with their attacks, potentially preventing you from retreating.

## Encyclopedia entry

Mirkwood spiders and Mirkwood elders share the same entry:

Old fat spider spinning in a tree!  
Old fat spider can’t see me!  
 Attercop! Attercop!  
   Won't you stop,  
Stop your spinning and look for me!  
  
Old Tomnoddy, all big body,  
Old Tomnoddy can’t spy me!  
 Attercop! Attercop!  
  Down you drop!  
You'll never catch me up your tree!  
  
Lazy Lob and crazy Cob  
are weaving webs to wind me.  
I am far more sweet than other meat,  
but still they cannot find me!  
  
Here am I, naughty little fly;  
you are fat and lazy.  
You cannot trap me, though you try,  
in your cobwebs crazy.

\[ The Hobbit, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]
html:
Mirkwood spider

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Mirkwood spiders are more powerful spiders that appear in dNetHack.

In addition to the common variety, there are also more dangerous mirkwood elders.

Mirkwood spider

s mirkwood spider (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks Bite 2d8 poison (strength), Kick 1d1 webbing
s mirkwood spider (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Bite 2d8 poison (strength), Kick 1d1 webbing

Base level 8
Base experience 131
Speed 15
Base AC 0
Base MR 0
Alignment −5 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size large
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed poison

A mirkwood spider:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • normally appears in large groups.
  • cannot be tamed.

The common mirkwood spiders are encountered on some quests; also, giant spiders will grow up into them.

Mirkwood spiders spread webbing with their attacks, potentially preventing you from retreating.

Mirkwood elder

s mirkwood elder (No tile)
Difficulty 19
Attacks Bite 4d8 vampiric, Kick 1d1 webbing
s mirkwood elder (No tile)
Difficulty 19
Attacks

Bite 4d8 vampiric, Kick 1d1 webbing

Base level 16
Base experience 429
Speed 18
Base AC 0
Base MR 0
Alignment −5 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 2900
Nutritional value 800
Size huge
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed poison

A mirkwood elder:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • cannot be tamed.

Mirkwood elders are ancient, blood-sucking spiders. Their vampiric bite attack drains a level on 1 out of every 3 successful attacks, regardless of magic cancellation.

Mirkwood elders also spread webbing with their attacks, potentially preventing you from retreating.

Encyclopedia entry

Mirkwood spiders and Mirkwood elders share the same entry:

Old fat spider spinning in a tree!
Old fat spider can’t see me!
 Attercop! Attercop!
   Won't you stop,
Stop your spinning and look for me!

Old Tomnoddy, all big body,
Old Tomnoddy can’t spy me!
 Attercop! Attercop!
  Down you drop!
You'll never catch me up your tree!

Lazy Lob and crazy Cob
are weaving webs to wind me.
I am far more sweet than other meat,
but still they cannot find me!

Here am I, naughty little fly;
you are fat and lazy.
You cannot trap me, though you try,
in your cobwebs crazy.

[ The Hobbit, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

In addition to the common variety, there are also more dangerous mirkwood elders.
